reviewText: Huge fan of Neon.  Have a collection of her performance and instruction DVDs.  Bought this to help me with tray of candle dancing.  She offers 3 full choreography instructions for beginner, intermediate and advance.  Each choreography shows the performance chapter first.  The beginner and intermediate offers step by step breaks down and explains each combo very well.  You also have options:learn, learn and practice with music or just practice. The advance shows performance and practice.I quite enjoy her enthusiasm and her charming accent.The end chapter of DVD "Logistics" offers advice such as selecting a tray, balancing the tray, preparing the roses/flowers,improvising your choreography...Highly recommend it!
summary: Another Fantastic instruction DVD by Neon
Title: N/A

reviewText: Echoing all previously-stated praise, here. I've got a couple of Neon's videos and none of them impressed me (dance party, big apple stars) but this one is great. Goodness, yes, I want to learn to balance trays of flowers, lit candles, cakes, and who knows what else on my head! Pretty cool. The instruction is really perfect, not tedious, over done, or slow. Tips on what kind of tray and how to get it to balance, invaluable. If you're a dancer, you've got a great show-stopper if you master this technique. Neon's a patient, sweet, encouraging, non-threatening instructor. Well-done, pleasing, delivers what it promises; no complaints at all, only praise for this niche-idea dvd.
Title: N/A

reviewText: If you've been searching for a dvd that clearly explains tray balancing techniques then look no further! Neon's precise teaching techniques, friendly demeanor and excellent dance skills take the mystery out of balancing and make it fun to learn. She also provides the student with several unique performance ideas. Every dancer should have this dvd in their reference library!
Title: N/A

reviewText: I actually came across this dvd by mistake, I thought I ordered something else and this showed up but I gave it a try.  What a great selection of routines for an intimate performance!  I really enjoyed the idea of showering or distributing roses from your tray during your dance.  I had never seen anyone perform balancing a tray on TOP of a veil covering the dancer before.Surprisingly easy- a beginner could pull off these dances and look very mysterious and accomplished. She even gets down to the nitty gritty of what kind of makeup to wear to prevent getting your hair caught in your lipstick.I must admit the coverart seemed a little cheesy and the very neon costume gave me my doubts but the performance was rather tastful and I absolutely LOVE her accent!

reviewText: Since everyone wrote great reviews, I'll just add I rented this dvd & quickly scanned this to see if I'd like it. Neon is a beautifully fluid & original dancer. This dvd production & black background with some graphic help is just like all her other dvds from worlddancenewyorkYou can see a full page review by a journalist/25+ year bellydancer at shira net/videorevws/neon-surprise htmYou can see clips of neon's dance ability at her site neonissima com or just look her up on youtube
